Name: 阿比斯的宝藏 - Treasure of abyss
About the game: [The strongest sea articles released] The North Sea is a sea of pirates. Here you can see the pirate ships of various forces at any time. You can compete with them. Only the strongest of the pirates can survive here. Conquer the forces of Pirates and restore the kingdom that once fell! The mark of Abis finally got together, and the door of Abis was about to open! New plots, new bosses, new challenges start here!
